ComicInfo.Series: Citizen V and the V-Battalion: The Everlasting
ComicInfo.Summary: With Roger Aubrey dead, who will lead the V-Battalion? Then again, since we're dealing with a villain who absorbs human souls, you can expect a dead Aubrey is going to provide plenty of agitation -- even from beyond the grave! What does Citizen V do when the only way to stop the bad guy... is to give him what he wants?
